content.en: Regression algorithms: Researchers have explored various aspects of algorithms used in regression analysis. They have investigated the geometry of partial least squares regression and proposed algorithms like NIPALS and SIMPLS for carrying out the analysis. They have also looked into reducing the computational complexity of the orthogonal least squares algorithm and developed preprocessing methods for this purpose. Additionally, they have examined the use of least squares residuals for computing the least absolute value estimate and explored the application of least squares method in new regression algorithms.
content.da: Regressionsalgoritmer: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige aspekter af algoritmer, der bruges i regressionsanalyse. De har undersøgt geometrien af partial least squares regression og foreslået algoritmer som NIPALS og SIMPLS til at udføre analysen. De har også undersøgt, hvordan man kan reducere den beregningsmæssige kompleksitet af den ortogonale mindst kvadraters algoritme og udviklet forbehandlingsmetoder til dette formål. Desuden har de undersøgt brugen af least squares residualer til beregning af least absolute value estimatet og udforsket anvendelsen af least squares metoden i nye regressionsalgoritmer.
